effect.diamond_pearl: Lowers the target’s Special Attack by two stages. If the user and target are the same gender, or either is genderless, this move will fail.
effect.platinum: Lowers the target’s Special Attack by two stages. If the user and target are the same gender, or either is genderless, this move will fail.
effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Lowers the target’s Special Attack by two stages. If the user and target are the same gender, or either is genderless, this move will fail.

short_effect.diamond_pearl: Lowers the target’s Special Attack by two stages if it’s the opposite gender.
short_effect.platinum: Lowers the target’s Special Attack by two stages if it’s the opposite gender.
short_effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Lowers the target’s Special Attack by two stages if it’s the opposite gender.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: If it is the opposite gender of the user, the foe is charmed into sharply lowering its Sp. Atk stat.
flavor_text.platinum: If it is the opposite gender of the user, the foe is charmed into sharply lowering its Sp. Atk stat.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: If it is the opposite gender of the user, the foe is charmed into sharply lowering its Sp. Atk stat.
